name: TriDiNoid
description:
TriDiNoid is a simple mix of Pong and Breakout  where to score player first need to break through opponents wall. It's still in the prototype stage so not everything is implemented. At the moment it is possible to play agains simple AI opponent but local 1v1 game should be available soon. It's advised to use x360 controller but keyboard will do as well. There is PowerShot ability that if pressed just before ball make contact with the paddle will power boost the ball towards enemy. First player to score 3 points win the match.

Update:

- Added keyboard controls: Up/Down arrows for movement and space for PowerShot

- PowerShot indicator
